item.title: Python Event-Driven Programming with RxPY - Tutorial
item.description: This tutorial was built using Python 3.6 The reactive programmingÂ paradigm is something that I’ve always been interested in upon learning about them when working with RxJS in my Angular 2+ based projects. Event based systems can dynamically react to different situations in smart ways and the ReactiveX library enables to do this in a such a way that our code is succinct and easy to follow.
